arts.ttl: Paul Warne issues brutal Derby County verdict after Oxford United draw
arts.sum: Paul Warne pulled no punches on Derby County's first-half performance in their 1-1 draw at Oxford United as he branded their display in the Championship clash as "horrific". And while Warne felt his side could have won the game with a bit more care in the final third, he said their first-half display left a lot to be desired.

arts.ttl: Des Buckingham unwell and dizzy during U’s draw with Rams
arts.sum: DES Buckingham left the Kassam Stadium almost immediately at the full-time whistle against Derby County after feeling dizzy and unwell during the second half.

arts.ttl: Draw specialists Oxford share spoils with Derby
arts.sum: Nathaniel Mendez-Laing cancelled out Dane Scarlett’s opener for the U’s.

arts.ttl: Paul Warne rings the changes as he names Derby County team to face Oxford United
arts.sum: Derby: Zetterstrom, Wilson, Nelson, Cashin, Elder; Osborn, Goudmijn, Adams; Blackett-Taylor, Yates, Mendez-Laing Nathaniel Mendez-Laing, Ben Osborn, Kane Wilson and Callum Elder started the clash at the Kassam Stadium with Marcus Harness, Kayden Jackson and Craig Forsyth dropping to the bench.

arts.ttl: Oxford United v Derby County live team news and updates from the Kassam stadium
arts.sum: Derby County will aim to secure their first away win in the Championship when they face newly-promoted Oxford United tonight. In what is an interesting sub plot, Derby will be reunited with Louie Sibley tonight with the academy graduate facing the Rams for the first time since he joined the Us in the summer.

arts.ttl: ‘Would be a risk’ – West Brom summer signing to miss Blackburn Rovers tie after Oxford United absence
arts.sum: West Brom will be without Mason Holgate again as they prepare to face Blackburn Rovers on Wednesday night,… The post ‘Would be a risk’ – West Brom summer signing to miss Blackburn Rovers tie after Oxford United absence appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Derby County players on guard after Louie Sibley messages as Rams exit explained
arts.sum: The 23-year-old spent severed a 14-year association with the Rams as he turned down a new contract to sign for the Us who were promoted along with Derby last season. “They’ve got a big game to prepare for, and I was there for my whole life, so if I know anything, I’ve told the coaches and the lads what they need to know.

arts.ttl: Handful of changes: Derby County team news and predicted XI to face Oxford United
arts.sum: Derby County are back in action this evening as they travel to face Oxford United off the back… The post Handful of changes: Derby County team news and predicted XI to face Oxford United appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Paul Warne resists temptation but makes double call in Derby County XI v Oxford
arts.sum: Derby County will look to build on their first away point of the Championship season tomorrow night when they tackle fellow promoted side Oxford United. After playing at the weekend, Warne must decide whether to freshen up his starting XI, with Nathaniel Mendez-Laing a likely candidate to return after he was named on the bench for the trip to the New Den at the weekend.

arts.ttl: Derby County hero posts update as he faces lifesaving operation
arts.sum: Derby also sent him a message of support on X today, which read: "Everyone at Derby County is thinking of former Rams' striker Marco Gabbiadini, who is due to undergo heart surgery this week. Derby County hero Marco Gabbiadini has announced he will undergo a lifesaving heart operation tomorrow.
